channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He satisfies a lot of my needs’: Meet the women in love with ChatGPT
item.description: The majority of women in these relationships say they feel misunderstood, and that AI bots have helped them during periods of isolation, grief, and il...

item.title: The books, TV series, and podcasts CEOs are tuning into this holiday season to unwind and elevate their careers in 2026
item.description: Fortune got a sneak peek into what CEOs will be reading, watching, and listening to this holiday season from The Diary of a CEO to Love Actually.

item.title: Trump just declared December 26th a national holiday. What’s open and closed?
item.description: It's one of two new holidays he announced last week.

item.title: After 23 years working for Jeff Bezos, the CEO of a $1.3 billion skills platform shares lessons he learned from Andy Jassy and the Amazon founder
item.description: In 1997, the day before Greg Hart joined Amazon, he was summoned to a meeting—on a Sunday—with its founder, Jeff Bezos.

item.title: As millions of Gen Zers face unemployment, CEOs of Amazon, Walmart, and McDonald’s say opportunity is still there—if you have the right mindset

item.title: Trump announces U.S. strikes on Islamists in Nigeria
item.description: The U.S. struck at Islamic State targets in Nigeria on Christmas Day, President Trump posted on social media Thursday evening.

item.title: Nonprofit uses underwater technology to search for missing service members
item.description: Project Recover uses advanced underwater technology to locate missing service members from past conflicts. The nonprofit has repatriated 24 Americans.

item.title: 'South Park' writer purchases Trump-Kennedy Center web addresses, plans parody sites
item.description: If the newly renamed Trump-Kennedy Center hoped to snag a website that reflects that disputed name change, a comedian beat them to it -- months ago.

item.title: Netflix Clings to DEI
item.description: Young white men today know not only that the world is unfair but that it is unfair for the benefit of others by design.

item.title: DHS arrests over 17,500 illegal immigrants under Laken Riley Act
item.description: More than 17,500 illegal immigrants have been arrested for crimes under the first law President Trump signed in his second term: the Laken Riley Act.

item.title: Lawmakers attempt to tackle NIL, giving it the 'old college try'
item.description: SCORE Act to regulate college athlete NIL deals faces uncertain future as Congress continues debates over treating student-athletes as employees.

item.title: O Holy Night
item.description: The true king has launched his final attack on the pretenders ruling this world. Rejoice!

item.title: What Is the American Heritage?
item.description: The static American bloodline that nationalists wish to defend against immigration has always been a fiction.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence In The Classroom Destroys Actual Intelligence In Students
item.description: Students should aspire to be more than mere 'prompt writers,' but minds capable of thinking, reasoning, and perseverance.
